reviewText:
For this price, I was sure this movie would be remastered. It is the same faded print as on TV where it is called THE SYNDICATE. Not sharp, with off-colour.
I don't think I've seen a film where the characters hate each other as much, which is really the biggest appeal and all that sets this film apart, apart from perhaps the lowest budget, as no sets were required, just the African bush as desolate as the characters.

I can't say that I found this movie to be enjoyable.  The characters in this movie for me weren't really likeable.  The movie failed to draw me in,  it tended to drag, and was about as interesting as watching paint dry on a wall.
